name: CloudpathEnrollmentServices
0:
”Alexa open network admin”
”Alexa ask network admin to get me on the network”
”Alexa ask network admin if the server is up”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: network admin
Developer Terms of Use
des: The network admin skill works with Ruckus Networks Cloudpath product to allow Alexa to request network access for a user, and have the network access information sent to the users mobile phone.
